name: The Haunting of You
description:
Your name is You. You are a medium. You have made a mistake.

In a gentrified Brooklyn, a group of ghosts has descended upon your house. They want your bodies. They want their home back.

Traverse between Limbo and the World of the Living and use plantain chips to navigate across the warped house. Solve puzzles from ghosts to gain their trust and assistance.

Save your family and learn what it means to be erased.

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Move dialogue
